author: Myria

text: @SupraDarky I played the first Ar Tonelico, "Melody of Elemia", and althou I'm not a passionate JRPG fan, I really enjoyed it! Not  masterpiece, but it has a nice story, nice characters and althou the main protagonist is an idiot, it's a nice experience overall! Someday I'm gonna play Ar Tonelico II and III, but for now I have to many games in my BackLog that still need to be beaten! ;)

text:
@Boyce18 Actually, I think you only encounter that bug if you're going for Cocona's ending. Plus, that bug can be prevented by dealing at least 40,000 damage to that boss by its third attack. From what I hear, that's not hard to do.

Not quite there in the game, though, so don't quote me on that.

author: SchweppesLemon

text:
SupraD, if you love Gust games (Atelier Iris series), you're probably gonna love this one. Part of it revolves around the relationship of the hero and the Reyvateils traveling with him. It's like a dating sim. And you have the whole story of the world being in danger, etc. 

Like I said, it is a good game if you like Gust games. And obviously, the soundtrack rocks. I never played AT2 because I've read there is a bug in the final battle that won't let you finish the game... WTH?

text: @TheRealVordox Yes, people do in real life as well, but they just flat out say things. We don't make every little action we take sound sexual. author: Arc13

text:
@Arc13 People have a sexual mind in the game?
Why not, most do in reality as well. :P
There's 2 things that annoyed me over the game, but they are more of a clash with my 100% perfection streak on games that I want to have.
The worst thing is that if you DO powergrind yourself, the game is quite easy. =/ Still worth the ride but they should've done something about the scaling.
author: Vordox

text: Wow, I'm impressed. Everyone's actually giving advice on the story, gameplay, graphics, etc. I guess I'll be the first and hopefully only person to mention the fact that inbetween all of this good is a ton of sexual innuendos. But it's still a very good game worth getting.
author: Arc13

author: CleverDjembe

text:
@SupraDarky I bought the game cause of your Ar Tonelico song of the Loki previous hundreds of VGM back.
As an RPG it's pretty solid, good characters, good story and a pretty good sound track.
And I love the 2D Graphics they did. <3
Totally worth the cost for it to be gotten.
